statements: DELETE FROM app_usage_statistics WHERE id = 5;
DELETE FROM app_usage_statistics WHERE user_id = 10 AND action_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM app_usage_statistics WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM app_usage_statistics WHERE app_id = 5 AND action_type = 'click' AND session_duration > 60;

DELETE FROM app_usage WHERE user_id = 100 AND datetime < '2022-09-01';
DELETE FROM app_usage WHERE user_id = 101 AND datetime < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM app_analytics WHERE app_id = 50 OR (event_type = 'error' AND event_time < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM ar_app_sessions WHERE app_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND session_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

DELETE FROM ar_app_performance WHERE app_id = 'a1234567-1234-5678-9abc-123456789abc' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01T00:00:00Z';

DELETE FROM app_performance WHERE session_id = 5 AND cpu_usage > 80;
DELETE FROM app_sessions WHERE session_end IS NULL;
DELETE FROM app_events WHERE event_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM app_users WHERE user_id = 1;
DELETE FROM app_errors WHERE error_code = 404;
